long_description: The Petzl Adapt Tikka(R) 2 mounting system allows your Petzl headlamp to be quickly and easily detached from the headband and attached to mounts placed on a helmet, belt or strap of a backpack. Kit includes 3 connection plates that replace the back covers on all Tikka(R)- and Zipka(R)-series headlamps. Connection plates allow the headlamp to then be attached to the included elastic headband, universal adhesive mount or clip mount. Adhesive mount can be stuck onto a helmet or any other hard surface; clip mount attaches easily to a belt, backpack strap or shirt pocket. Mounts allow headlamp to tilt up and down 45deg; headlamp can rotate around on the mounts a full 360deg. Compatible with Petzl Tikka, Tikka Plus, Tikka XP, Tikka 2, Tikka Plus 2, Tikka XP 2, Zipka, Zipka Plus, Zipka 2 and Zipka Plus 2 headlamps. Also compatible with Petzl Tikkina(R), Tikkina 2, Tactikka(R) and Tactikka Plus headlamps.
